TopicTitle: Kerbol sphere not rendered in flight view until very close

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win10 | CPU: i710700K | GPU: RTX2060 | RAM: 32GB

It's what it is. Up until very close, and I mean VERY close, where it's pretty much blinding the player, it's just a sunflare that changes the size.

It's perfectly visible at all times in map view, but not in flight.

...and the sunflare itself is very low res.

Has been like that since day 1.
